author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-E. W. Scripps - Has Streamlined Its Local Media Segment And Corporate Cost Structure
text:
E. W. Scripps Co:
* E. W. SCRIPPS - HAS STREAMLINED ITS LOCAL MEDIA SEGMENT AND CORPORATE COST STRUCTURE AND EXPECTS TO YIELD MORE THAN $30 MILLION IN ANNUAL SAVINGS
* E. W. SCRIPPS - SCRIPPS BOARD UNANIMOUSLY RECOMMENDS THAT SHAREHOLDERS VOTE “FOR” EACH OF BOARD’S DIRECTOR NOMINEES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
